channel.title: I need major help
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: Ok, I would really like someone to help me with starting my own server. I am a EXTREME noob when it comes to this stuff. I have been looking around and I can't find a good site or anything that has a step by step guid. I would love it if somebody could guide me through this. Once I get to the part where you change all the shops, and NPCs, and monsters and stuff I think i'll be ok. But... I don't know. So please help me! I am desperate. :confused: :confused:
PS And if you would like when I get my server up and running you could be an admin!

item.title: I need major help
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

OK first thing you have done. but i suggest you download pimpscape as its noob friendly and easiest to code. Once you have got it open it up. First thing you should do is open up your client.java and press ctrl+H and replace all “pimpscape” and the name of your server. Now go to the tutorial section of moparsacpe and learn to edit your own server.

Remember everytime you edit your server you must compile it by opening compile and compiling it. Now to run your server just open up your runserver and leave it running. Open up your moparscape client and because its running from your computer u can us 0.0.0.0 as your IP. Once logged on log straight out and open up the characters file. Open your character up and change the Char rights to 3 which wilol make u admin. Hope this helps =)

Read full topic
